mapper.sql: SELECT B.B_NO, M.M_NO, B.B_TITLE, B.B_TYPE, B.B_DATE, B.B_CONTENT, B.B_ORIGINAL_FILENAME, B.B_VIEW, B.B_STATUS, B.B_ANSWER_STATUS, M.M_ID FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.M_NO = M.M_NO) WHERE B.B_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE B_STATUS='Y' AND B_TYPE = #{type}
AND B.B_TYPE = #{type} ORDER BY B.B_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET B_STATUS = #{bstatus} WHERE B_NO = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( B_NO, B_TITLE, B_TYPE, M_NO, M_ID, B_CONTENT, B_ORIGINAL_FILENAME, B_RENAMED_FILENAME, B_VIEW, B_STATUS, B_ANSWER_STATUS, B_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{btitle}, #{btype}, #{mno}, #{mid}, #{bcontent}, #{boriginalfilename}, #{brenamedfilename}, #{bview}, #{bstatus}, #{banswerstatus}, DEFAULT )
mapper.update:
UPDATE BOARD
B_TITLE = #{btitle},
B_CONTENT = #{bcontent},
B_ORIGINAL_FILENAME = #{boriginalfilename},
B_RENAMED_FILENAME = #{brenamedfilename},
WHERE B_NO = #{bno}
